meanings.definition: To be the property of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The red ball belongs to Sarah.
meanings.sent2: The book belongs on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thinks the entire house belongs to him.
meanings.sent4: In her heart, she knows that the decision belongs to her alone.
meanings.sent5: The melody belongs to the wind, carrying it far and wide.

meanings.definition: To be a member of a particular group or category.
meanings.sent1: He belongs to the chess club at school.
meanings.sent2: The fluffy cat belongs to the feline family.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy thinks he belongs in the cat group.
meanings.sent4: In this vast universe, we all belong to the human race.
meanings.sent5: The colorful feather belongs to the bird, making it unique.
